summary: This modification puts the Mark III Iron Man Suit from the first film into Skyrim along with his repulsor weapon.
descriptionHtml:
This modification puts the Mark III Iron Man Suit from the first film into Skyrim along with his repulsor weapon as an additional magic item.
Both the Suit parts and the spell book for acquiring the weapon can be crafted at the smithing forge, with the suit listed under "Steel" and the book under "Misc".

//Notes on usage//
Given the nature of it, the suit and the repulsor are rather overpowered against normal enemies within the game.
Due to the shape of the suit not being similar to that of the base Skyrim body and armour models, the parts aren't compatible with any other armour parts or even the player itself and as such is a stand alone armour.

//Release Information//
This is very much a Beta release and as such updates will happen if and when required.
author: Shocker
